prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (imposing alien overlord:1.2), (white biological chitinous shell:1.2), crystalline translucent purple nodes, piercing crimson eyes, chilling expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed organic texture, (weathered bone-like surface:1.2), (wet biological sheen:1.1), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching crystalline gemstone depth:1.3), cinematic rim lighting, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human proportions, bulky, low quality, furry, soft fleshy skin, airbrushed
